summary: An Ordinance providing for the improvement of Belvidere Avenue, from Thirty-eight Avenue Southwest to West Lander Street; Thirty-seventh Avenue Southwest, from West Hinds Street to West Lander Street; Thirty-sixth Avenue Southwest, from West Stevens Street to West Lander Street; Manning Street, from Thirty-eight Avenue Southwest to Belvidere Avenue; West Hinds Street, West Hanford Street and West Stevens Street, each from Thirty-eight Avenue Southwest to Thirty-seventh Avenue Southwest; all in the City of Seattle. all in accordance with Resolution No. 5876 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating a local improvement district therefor, and providing that payment of said improvement be made by special assessments upon property in said district payable by mode of "Payment by Bonds".
